kDesc
Compete head-to-head as you challenge your friends or pit your driving skills against the clock as you race your fully customizable RC car in the first race of its kind for PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]

친구들과 경쟁하거나 자신의 최고 기록에 도전하면서 다양한 커스텀이 가능한 RC 카를 운전하십시오. PlayStation®Home에 처음으로 등장하는 미니 레이스입니다![#Legal]
Compete head-to-head as you challenge your friends or pit your driving skills against the clock as you race your fully customizable RC car in the first race of its kind for PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]
在PlayStation®Home上駕駛你的全自訂越野賽車，挑戰史無前例的賽事，與好友比試或以你的駕駛技術跟時間競賽。[#Legal]
在PlayStation®Home上駕駛你的全自訂越野賽車，挑戰史無前例的賽事，與好友比試或以你的駕駛技術跟時間競賽。[#Legal]

kPopup
Compete head-to-head as you challenge your friends or pit your driving skills against the clock as you race your fully customizable RC car in the first race of its kind for PlayStation®Home.

Affrontez des amis en duel ou mettez vos talents de pilote à rude épreuve contre la montre aux commandes de votre voiture RC Rally entièrement personnalisable dans la première épreuve de course du genre sur PlayStation®Home.

Tritt Kopf-an-Kopf gegen deine Freunde an oder teste deine fahrerischen Fähigkeiten gegen die Uhr – im ersten Rennspiel seiner Art in PlayStation®Home kannst du mit deinem vollständig anpassbaren RC-Wagen Rennen fahren.

Competi in testa a testa con i tuoi amici, o metti alla prova le tue abilità di guida contro il tempo, mentre guidi la tua auto RC totalmente personalizzabile, nella prima gara per PlayStation®Home unica nel suo genere.
Compite cara a cara con tus amigos o enfréntate al cronómetro con un coche de control remoto totalmente personalizable, en la primera carrera de este tipo en PlayStation®Home.
Compete head-to-head as you challenge your friends or pit your driving skills against the clock as you race your fully customizable RC car in the first race of its kind for PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]
